entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:48 a.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.3Â°C

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with ice pellets early this morning. Risk of freezing rain. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
